task:
Input: processed MERFISH AnnData. Use expression only. Use existing clusters or compute Leiden (PCA=50, n_neighbors=30, resolution=0.6). For each cluster, run one-vs-all DE with t-test, filter positive logFC and adj p≤0.05, rank by logFC then −log10(p_adj), take **top-9** (uppercase). Assign clusters to **Inhibitory interneuron** based on marker expression; return pooled, de-duplicated **top-9 Inhibitory markers** as `markers_predicted`.

Output:
<EVAL_ANSWER>{"markers_predicted": ["GENE1", ...]}</EVAL_ANSWER>
